BUILD_COMMAND: cd /path/to/target && command to run javac with analysis (e.g. ./gradlew :p:compileJava)

DOWNSTREAM_DEPENDENCY.BUILD_COMMAND: cd /path/to/dependencies && command to run javac with analysis (e.g. ./gradlew :p:compileJava)
DOWNSTREAM_DEPENDENCY.LIBRARY_MODEL_LOADER_PATH: path to nullaway library model loader jar
